author: BrickBuiltBill
title: A converted firehouse? Hmmm...
review:
First off, I want to say that this set is fun for everyone, regardless of age... or GENDER.

Just like dolls need a dollhouse, Minidolls need a "Mini-dollhouse". In that regard, the Friendship House delivers! If you're interested in collecting the reboot-era sets, this is a good place to start. There's a lot of variety in the accessories, and the set is a good value for the money. The building process was a refreshing departure from what I'm used to, with different building techniques. Having said all this, while the Friendship House has plenty of play value on its own, it IS meant to go with the Mission Vehicle, hence a rating of 4 under "Playability". If you can find this set, I recommend picking it up. And if it's for a good price, even better.
